generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, separated by a curb and some barriers.
- building: A large building with scaffolding and a vertical "HOTEL" sign is prominently visible on the left side of the image.
- wall: A large, solid, light-colored wall is visible on the left side of the road, acting as a barrier.
- fence: A temporary fence with metal mesh is visible behind the wall on the left side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one with traffic signs on the right side of the road and others supporting the scaffolding on the left.
- traffic sign: Multiple traffic signs are visible, including a "No Parking" sign and other regulatory signs on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are visible along the right side of the road and in the background.
- terrain: A small patch of grass or terrain is visible behind the white barrier on the right side of the road.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background, appearing overcast and gray.
- person: Several people are visible in the image, including workers on the scaffolding on the left side of the road and a person walking on the sidewalk on the right side.
- car: A car is visible in the distance, driving on the road ahead.
- truck: A truck is visible parked or moving on the road ahead, near the center of the image.
